currency_handler module¶

currency_handler.get_adjusted_price(price, currency, currency_data)¶

Return adjusted price and name of company the label is referring to.

If a user wants the price value in a currency different from the dollar this function computes the stock value in such currency.

Parameters

  • price (float) – The price of the stock of the chosen company

  • currency (string) – The currency name chosen by the user

  • currency_data (Pandas.Dataframe object) – The dataframe containing information on currencies

Returns

price and name of the company

Return type

string, string
